article_title: Slideshow: Mug shots for the week of Dec. 6
article_text:
The tables were turned on a man who shot and wounded a woman he saw breaking into his work vehicle.

Pedro Sales was jailed on aggravated assault and a weapons violation.

His mug shot joins the booking photos of others arrested in this week's slideshow.

Note: All suspects are considered innocent unless found guilty in a court of law.

[Mobile users click here to view mug shots]
